messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] archives
messages.msgSnippet: At the bottom of the e-mail it says messages (if you re on full- featured e-mail).  Click there, and they ll give you a search box (upper right?) If you re
messages.messageBody:
At the bottom of the e-mail it says "messages" (if you're on full-
featured e-mail). Click there, and they'll give you a search box
(upper right?)

If you're reading at the site, you're already there.

If you have simple e-mail, go to the yahoogroups site and search there.

The search feature used to be slow and awful, but they did fix it up
very nicely!

This is all I have on my site, I think:
http://sandradodd.com/s/lying

You might also search the archives at
http://groups.google.com/group/UnschoolingDiscussion
or
http://unschooling.info/forum

Sandra

messages.subject: archives
messages.msgSnippet: hi all, i have been on the list a while and read that it is possible to search the archives.  please could you tell me how to do this? i m interested to see if
messages.messageBody:
hi all,
i have been on the list a while and read that it is possible to search
the archives. please could you tell me how to do this?
i'm interested to see if anyone has posted about children, hate to use
the word, "lying".
blessings
michelle
